comments: 8 times pentagonal numbers. - _Omar E. Pol_, Dec 11 2008Sequence found by reading the line from 0, in the direction 0, 8, ..., in the square spiral whose vertices are the generalized octagonal A001082. - _Omar E. Pol_, Jul 18 2012
mathematica: s=0;lst={s};Do[s+=n++ +8;AppendTo[lst, s], {n, 0, 8!, 24}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Nov 16 2008 *)
author: _Mohammad K. Azarian_
